name: EyeOpen
0:
”Alexa, Open Garage Door”
”Alexa, Close Garage Door”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill is developed for EyeOpen compatible devices via voice control to open/close it.

1. Download the "EyeOpen" APP from Google Play or APP Store
2. Setup your device with the EyeOpen APP
3. Enable device with Alexa Skill
4. Link skill "EyeOpen" with your EyeOpen account
5. Control your device with Voice Command
 a. Open the Garage Door
 b. Close the Garage Door

Open up your life with an intelligent experience.
From now on, you can manage and control your garage door with your Android phone at home or even miles away. You no longer have to worry about leaving your house without closing the garage door. With Eyeopen, you can check on the door’s status and close it right away. Eyeopen allows for better control over your home and gives you peace of mind.

Eyeopen requires working with the Powertech garage door opener or a compatible garage door opener. Please email us at sales@powertech.tw for more purchase information.

Notice: Alexa does not authenticate who issuing the request. Anybody can command it to open your EyeOpen device.
